updates.description: Next paper or announcement of binging One Piece.
Reviewing for MICCAI 2025, NeurIPS 2025 and ICML 2025.
KneeXNeT accepted to MICAD'24. Congrats Nicahree!
Awarded $1000 travel grant for SPIE Medical Imaging'25.
Cluster Dice accepted at SPIE Medical Imaging'25. A new segment matching scheme for instance wise semantic segmentation evaluation. Big thanks to Aaron!
Member of Technical Programme Committee for ISBI 2025.
Promptly-Cited accepted at NeurIPS-WiML Workshop. Generating citation based LLM responses directly at inference time. Congrats Pooja!
Talk for Voxel 51 on my current Ph.D. work!
Graduate TA for Research Club - Biomedical Engineering with Prof. Monica Agromayor
Hosted 2 High School Interns via the In2STEM programme.
Reviewing for NeurIPS, MICCAI-FAIMI, CaPTion@MICCAI, and ICML-ML4MLS 2024.
Best Student Poster Award Finalist at ISBI'24.
SegPatch accepted at ISBI'24! Pilot work on Spinal Osteophyte Identification in X-Rays. Big Thanks to Yuanhan Mo!
Student Representative for the KCL MRC DTP. Also a National-Level Student Representative of the MRC DTP.
Top 8 Finish at Anthropic-London Hackathon. We made a mock co-pilot for Python debugging for the terminal.
Began my alignment on the Smart Imaging CDT.
